app_question_title_for_parent_4: Hvordan inviterer jeg mit barn til appen?
app_question_title_for_parent_5: Hvad handler lommepenge, opgaver og renter om?
app_question_answer_for_parent_5:
T√¶nk p√• det som penge man l√¶rer af. Det handler om at skabe et livslangt gl√¶deligt og sundt forhold til penge! 

1. Lommepenge: Et startbel√∏b, der altid udbetales. Det giver barnet mulighed for at l√¶re forbindelsen mellem opsparing og forbrug. 
2. Opgaver: Problemer, som b√∏rn f√•r betaling for at l√∏se. N√•r man f√•r et sundt forhold til penge, handler det ikke kun om opsparing og forbrug, men ogs√• om at tjene penge. Det optjente bel√∏b udbetales ud over lommepengene. 
3. Renter er en af de vigtigste √∏konomiske f√¶nomener og en vigtig lektion for voksenlivet! Renteudbetalinger foretages hver uge eller m√•ned, da det viser sig, at b√∏rn har sv√¶rt ved at relatere sig til l√¶ngere perioder.
app_question_title_for_parent_7: Hvorn√•r skal jeg begynde at give ugentlige eller m√•nedlige lommepenge?
app_question_answer_for_parent_7: Det er almindeligt at indf√∏re ugentlige lommepenge, n√•r barnet er omkring 5 √•r, skifte til m√•nedlige lommepenge, n√•r barnet er omkring 11 √•r. P√• dette tidspunkt vil barnet √∏ve sig i at administrere penge i samme tidsrum som de fleste voksne g√∏r.
app_question_title_for_parent_8: Hvad er jeres bedste tips, n√•r det kommer til opgaver?
app_question_answer_for_parent_8:
1. Begynd med at give gentagne opgaver: regelm√¶ssighed giver struktur. 
2. √òg vanskeligheden af opgaverne, i takt med at b√∏rnene bliver √¶ldre. 
3. Betal kun for de opgaver, som b√∏rnene ellers ikke ville have gjort. At s√¶tte et prism√¶rke p√• en opgave indikerer, at det er okay at sige nej til pengene og dermed ogs√• opgaven. 
4. Du kan opmuntre b√∏rnene til selv at foresl√• deres egne opgaver, hvilket kan opmuntre deres f√∏lelse af iv√¶rks√¶tteri! 
5. S√¶t automatisk godkendelse til, fordi der er mere til livet end at sidde med n√¶sen i en app!
app_question_answer_for_parent_9:
Rente er en af verdens vigtigste √∏konomiske f√¶nomener, men ogs√• en af de sv√¶reste at forst√•. At blive introduceret tl konceptet tidligt i et kontrolleret milj√∏ er en fantastisk m√•de at l√¶re det p√•. Vores bedste anbefalinger: 
1. Renten b√∏r v√¶re h√∏j nok til at skabe renter til en rimelig opsparingskapital. 
2. Renten b√∏r v√¶re lav nok til ikke at generere for meget interesse i forhold til de ugentlige eller m√•nedlige penge. 
3. Rentesatsen udbetales hver Payday. Regelm√¶ssighed g√∏r l√¶ring lettere.
app_question_title_for_parent_10: Hvad kan jeg g√∏re for at hj√¶lpe mit barn med at spare penge op?
app_question_answer_for_parent_10:
Vi har stenalderhjerner, der foretr√¶kker at handle p√• impulsen i stedet for at t√¶nke p√• lang sigt. Derfor m√• vi fors√∏ge at spare op. Nogle tips: 
1. Ops√¶t en dr√∏m, noget specifikt atspare op til. Det hj√¶lper os med at modst√• impulser. 
2. Giv mulighed for at tjene ekstra penge ved at udf√∏re opgaver. 
3. Betal renter p√• de opsparede penge. 
4. Match det bel√∏b, som barnet kan spare op, og lav et depositum til skyen.
app_question_title_for_parent_11: Hvordan hj√¶lper jeg mit barn til at forbruge p√• en klog m√•de?
app_question_answer_for_parent_11:
1. Lad b√∏rnene bestemme, hvordan de bruger deres penge, s√• de kan l√¶re af deres egne oplevelser. 
2. Lav en h√¶vning fra skyen for hvert k√∏b, s√• det er lettere at holde styr p√• deres udgifter. 
3. Hj√¶lp b√∏rnene med at unders√∏ge f√∏r deres k√∏b ved at l√¶se anmeldelser og sammenligne priser. 
4. Introducer dem til genbrug: det er bedre for pungen og milj√∏et!
app_question_title_for_kid_1: Hvordan inviterer jeg mine for√¶ldre til appen?

nederst p√• siden.

app_question_title_for_kid_4: Jeg kan ikke logge p√•, hvad g√∏r jeg?
app_question_answer_for_kid_4: Hvis du ikke kan logge p√•, kan det skyldes mange forskellige grunde. M√•ske har du tastet den forkete email adresse eller telefonnummer? Hvis du har problemer med at logge ind, kan du altid kontakte os via chat-appen eller p√• hjemmesiden (√•bent alle hverdage kl. 9.00 til 17.00) eller send os en mail p√• hello@gimitheapp.com
app_question_title_for_kid_6: Jeg vil have flere penge! Hvad kan jeg g√∏re?
app_question_answer_for_kid_6:
Tjen penge ved at l√∏se problemer, som en anden er villig til at betale for. Her er nogle eksempler: 
1. L√∏s flere opgaver: L√∏s problemer for dine kontakter i appen! 
2. Start din egen virksomhed: Er der nogen andre end dine in-app-kontakter, der har et problem, der kan l√∏ses? Sp√∏rg dine for√¶ldre om hj√¶lp! 
3. F√• et job: Ligesom andre har problemer, der skal l√∏ses, s√• g√¶lder det ogs√• virksomheder. (Husk, du skal v√¶re teenager for at g√∏re dette) \ n4. S√¶lg dine gamle ting: Der er sikkert en anden, der har brug for det. 
5. Forhandle: Kan du f√• betalt mere for de problemer, du allerede l√∏ser?
app_question_answer_for_kid_7:
Rente er en bonus, du f√•r for at spare penge. 
1. Jo flere penge du har i skyen, jo mere rente f√•r du p√• Payday! 
2. Jo h√∏jere renten (i %), jo mere rente f√•r du p√• Payday (det er dine voksne, der bestemmer renten)
app_question_title_for_kid_8: Hvad kan jeg g√∏re for at n√• min dr√∏m hurtigere?
app_question_answer_for_kid_8:
Opskrift p√•, hvordan du n√•r din dr√∏m: 
1. Tjen flere penge 
2. Brug mindre penge 
3. En kombination af 1 og 2.
app_question_title_for_kid_9: Hvordan bruger jeg penge som en pro?
app_question_answer_for_kid_9:
At have penge kan f√• os til at f√∏le som om vi har superkr√¶fter. Hvis vi ikke bruger det rigtigt, kan det blive brugt alt for hurtigt op. Her er nogle tips til, hvordan du bruger dem klogt: 
1. Sp√∏rg dig selv, er den ting du vil k√∏be s√• vigtig for dig? Hvis ikke, spar pengene til noget andet! 
2. L√¶s anmeldelser. Hvis mange mennesker er utilfredse med et produkt, er det en god id√© at genoverveje dit k√∏b. 
3. Sammenlign priser og find den billigste, men husk at hvis det er for godt til at v√¶re sandt, s√• er det det nok ogs√•. 
4. K√∏b genbrug. Det er ofte billigere og altid bedre for milj√∏et. 
5. Brug ikke penge, du ikke har: spar i stedet for at l√•ne!
card_question_title_for_parent_2: Hvad er forskellen mellem et normalt bankkort og Gimi-kortet?
card_question_answer_for_parent_2: Med Gimi-kortet kan du oprette udgiftsbegr√¶nsninger, have automatiseret lommepengeudbetaling, blokere og unblokere kortet i appen nemt, se udgiftsstatistikker, og kortet kan bestilles i appen. L√¶s mere om Gimi-kortet p√• vores hjemmeside, gimitheapp.com
card_question_title_for_parent_3: Hvad skal jeg g√∏re, hvis mit barns Gimi-kort bliver tabt eller stj√•let?
card_question_answer_for_parent_3: Hvis kortet er tabt eller stj√•let, skal du blokere kortet i appen. Hvis det ikke kan findes, kan et nyt kort bestilles som erstatning. Dette kan alt sammen g√∏res i
card_question_title_for_parent_4: Kan jeg begr√¶nse mit barns udgifter?
card_question_answer_for_parent_4:
Nogle handle kategorier er blokerede, og kortet kan ikke bruges i disse butikker som en sikkerhedsforanstaltning. Butikker i disse kategorier er blokeret: 
- Told- og broafgifter 
- Automatiserede br√¶ndstofdispensere 
- Drikkesteder (alkoholholdige drikkevarer, barer og tavernaer 
- Pakkeforretninger, √∏l, vin og spiritus 
- Tobaksforretninger og stande 
- Dating og eskorttjenester 
- Internet gambling 
- Regeringslicenserede hest- eller hundev√¶ddel√∏b 
- V√¶ddem√•l (herunder lottosedler, casino spil og off-track) 

Derudover kan du oprette forbrug notifikationer for at vide, hvorn√•r dit barn har brugt for mange penge, og du kan blokere kortet i appen.
card_question_answer_for_parent_5: Dette g√∏res under kortindstillinger i appen.
card_question_title_for_parent_6: Hvor gammel skal du v√¶re for at f√• et Gimi-kort?
card_question_answer_for_parent_6: Vi har ikke en streng aldersgr√¶nse for kortet, vi mener, at det er noget, alle for√¶ldre selv skal beslutte. Men vi anbefaler, at alle b√∏rn gennemf√∏rer vores korttest.
card_question_title_for_parent_7: Hvordan ved jeg, om mit barn er klar til et kort?
card_question_title_for_parent_8: Hvorfor skal mit barn have Gimi-kortet?
card_question_answer_for_parent_9: Gimi-kortet kan bruges i udlandet, online og i butikker. Nogle butikker og onlinebutikker er blokeret som en sikkerhedsforanstaltning. Gimi-kortet kan ikke bruges i en pengeautomat.
card_question_title_for_kid_1: Jeg har glemt mit PIN-kode, hvad skal jeg g√∏re?
card_question_title_for_kid_3: Hvad er forskellen mellem et normalt bankkort og Gimi-kortet?
card_question_answer_for_kid_3: Med Gimi-kortet kan du handle online, logge ind og tjekke din saldo selv, anmode om penge og se din udgiftsstatistik. L√¶s mere om Gimi-kortet p√• vores hjemmeside, gimitheapp.com
card_question_title_for_kid_4: Hvad skal jeg g√∏re, hvis mit Gimi-kort bliver tabt eller stj√•let?
card_question_answer_for_kid_4: Fort√¶l det straks til dine for√¶ldre og bed dem om at blokere dit kort. Hvis du tror du har mistet det, skal du lede efter det. Hvis du finder det, kan dine for√¶ldre bare unblokere kortet igen. Hvis du ikke finder kortet eller hvis det er blevet stj√•let, skal du lade det forblive blokeret og bede dine for√¶ldre om at bestille et nyt.
card_question_answer_for_kid_5: Du har brug for dine for√¶ldres hj√¶lp til at g√∏re dette, s√• sp√∏rg dem. :)
card_question_title_for_kid_6: Jeg vil have Gimi-kortet, hvad g√∏r jeg?
card_question_answer_for_kid_6: B√∏rn kan ikke bestille et kort fra os, kun for√¶ldre kan. Det er vi kede af!
card_question_answer_for_kid_8: A PIN code is like a password to your card. When you buy something in a store you need to insert your card and enter your PIN code in order for the card to work.
card_question_title_for_kid_9: What do I do if I type the wrong PIN code too many times?
card_question_answer_for_kid_9: If you type the wrong code three times the card will be blocked. That means you can‚Äôt use the card anymore. The card can be unblocked by your parents, so talk to them if the card has been blocked.
card_question_title_for_kid_10: My card isn‚Äôt working, what has happened?
card_question_answer_for_kid_10:
When paying for something with your card, it could happen that it says the purchase was not approved. This means that for some reason the transaction was not successful and the stuff you were going to buy was not paid for. There could be a few reasons for this:  
You don‚Äôt have enough money on your card. Double check that you have enough money on your card by logging in to the Gimi app. 
You entered the wrong PIN code 
The card details that you entered were wrong. Look at your card again and double check them. The card number is super long, maybe you typed in a wrong digit somewhere? 
You are trying to purchase something from one of the stores that we have blocked 
Your parents haven‚Äôt approved your card for online purchases. Talk to them about it.
card_question_title_for_kid_11: Where can the Gimi Card be used?
card_question_answer_for_kid_11: The Gimi Card can be used abroad, online and in stores. Some stores and online stores are blocked as a safety measure. The Gimi Card can not be used at an ATM.
gimi_question_answer_for_parent_1: We make money from our Premium users who choose to pay our subscription cost. We always strive to be transparent with our pricing and never to abuse or sell any customer data or private information to any third party user.
gimi_question_title_for_parent_2: What is Gimi‚Äôs vision and goals?
gimi_question_answer_for_parent_2:
We believe in young people and want to give them financial superskills - for life. By this we mean that we want to give the power to young people to make great financial decisions by learning about money management. We will not rest until we have made money concepts and other complicated subjects concrete, real and meaningful for everybody. 
Joyful - We make earning, saving and spending money both easy and fun. 
Clever - We make money and other complicated subjects concrete, real and meaningful.  
Empowering  young people to make great financial decisions throughout their life by learning about money concepts, and money management.
gimi_question_answer_for_parent_3: We started Gimi since there is a lack of understanding when it comes to money and because society needs a new way to educate young people about money.
gimi_question_answer_for_parent_4: Our ethical guidelines show how we work with children and teenagers, and how we adapt our marketing and services so that they're understandable for everyone. Our ethical rules can be read on our website gimitheapp.com
gimi_question_title_for_parent_5: How do I get in contact with Gimi?
gimi_question_answer_for_parent_5: You can contact us through our chat (open weekdays, 9am - 5pm), either on our website or in the app. You can always drop us an email to hello@gimitheapp.com
gimi_question_answer_for_kid_1: We make money from our Premium users who choose to pay our subscription cost. We always strive to be transparent with our pricing and never to abuse or sell any customer data or private information to any third party user.

register_question_title_for_parent_1: How do I order the Gimi Card?
register_question_answer_for_parent_1: The Gimi Card can be ordered on our website or in the app.
register_question_title_for_parent_2: How do I connect my child to the app?
register_question_answer_for_parent_2:
1. Go to the ‚ÄúProfile‚Äù tab. 
2. Select ‚ÄúMy contacts‚Äù. 
3. Select ‚ÄúInvite child‚Äù. 
4. Select ‚ÄúScan QR-code‚Äù or ‚ÄúSend message‚Äù.
register_question_title_for_parent_4: The Gimi Card has arrived, what to do now?
register_question_answer_for_parent_4:
First of all, congratulations on the card, we hope that it will serve your family well for a long time. Now, give your kid the best possible start to spending their money  
1. Take out the card from the package. 
2. Go into the app an activate the Card. 
3. Go through the card details (everything on the card) and how to use it. 
4. Look at the app, tell your child about the different functionalities. What does balance mean? What is a transaction? 
5. Go through the test questions. What to do with the PIN code? 
6. Deposit money on the card, then go and make their first purchase together!
register_question_title_for_kid_1: I want the Gimi Card, what do I do?
register_question_answer_for_kid_1: As a child you can‚Äôt order a card from us, your parents need to do that. Sorry!
register_question_title_for_kid_2: I have got my Gimi Card, now what do I do?
register_question_answer_for_kid_2:
First of all, congratulations on receiving your Gimi Card. We hope it will serve you and your family well. 
1. Take out the card from the package. 
2. Go into the app and activate the Card. 
. Go through all the card details with your parents. Check out this article [link to article ‚ÄúWhat does all the numbers and stuff on the card mean?‚Äù] 
4. Look at the app to check the functionalities. Can you see the Card balance? How much money is there in the savings account? 
5. Go through the test questions again. What to do with the PIN code? 
6. Now you are ready to make your first purchase. If you want to, ask your parents or an older sibling to go with you the first time.
register_question_title_for_kid_3: How do I connect my parents to the app?
register_question_answer_for_kid_3:
1. Go to the ‚ÄúProfile‚Äù tab. 
2. Select ‚ÄúMy contacts‚Äù. 
3. Select ‚ÄúInvite grown-up‚Äù. 
4. Select ‚ÄúScan QR-code‚Äù or ‚ÄúSend message‚Äù.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_p: What personal information is required when ordering or registering the Gimi Card?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: To verify the parents‚Äô identity we use BankID which requires a personal identity number. Other than that, we require your address, so that we can send you the Card, and the child‚Äôs name, so it can be printed on the Card.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_p: How do you handle personal information and data that I create?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: Compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_p: How strong is Gimi‚Äôs data security?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_:
Gimi‚Äôs data security is strong. We encrypt all data using SSL/HTTPS. And for your own safety, we verify your identity before you can start managing money. In bank language, this is called Know Your Customer: all in accordance with international banking regulations. For users ordering the Card, we use BankID (parents) and Instantor to comply with all regulations around verifying users' identity. 
 
Users managing real money in the app can feel safe, your data is protected with a two factor authentication method. Also, the Gimi Card is not connected to a specific account, our card maker, PFS, keeps track of the transfers and to whom they belong. The money is actually safer than a usual bank account: neither we nor the bank has access to the money. 
 
We handle all personal information and data that you create in compliance with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_p: How do I block my child‚Äôs Gimi Card if it‚Äôs lost or stolen?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: Go into Card settings to block it. The card can easily be unblocked again if it‚Äôs found.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_k: What personal information is required when ordering or registering the Gimi Card?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: To verify the parents‚Äô identity we use BankID which requires a personal identity number. Other than that, we require your address, so that we can send you the Card, and the child‚Äôs name, so it can be printed on the Card.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_k: How do you handle personal information and data that I create?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: Compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_k: How strong is Gimi‚Äôs data security?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_:
Gimi‚Äôs data security is strong. We encrypt all data using SSL/HTTPS. And for your own safety, we verify your identity before you can start managing money. In bank language, this is called Know Your Customer: all in accordance with international banking regulations. For users ordering the Card, we use BankID (parents) and Instantor to comply with all regulations around verifying users' identity. 
 
Users managing real money in the app can feel safe, your data is protected with a two factor authentication method. Also, the Gimi Card is not connected to a specific account, our card maker, PFS, keeps track of the transfers and to whom they belong. The money is actually safer than a usual bank account: neither we nor the bank has access to the money. 
 
We handle all personal information and data that you create in compliance with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS.
rights_and_security_question_title_for_k: How do I block my Gimi Card if it‚Äôs lost or stolen?
rights_and_security_question_answer_for_: The Gimi Card needs to be blocked by your parent. Ask them to do it for you. It can be done in their settings. It can be unblocked if the card should be found again.
welcome_to_gimi_desc_1: For young people who want to earn, grow and spend their own money!
welcome_to_gimi_desc_2: Receive your weekly or monthly pocket money. Earn extra by doing chores and save your money to reach your dream.
welcome_to_gimi_desc_3: Receive interest on the money you save and follow the money as they grow. No more cash or missed payments from your parents!
custom_notification_get_money: PLZ_CHECK no money in the loop, invite a grown-up
delete_connection_sure: are you sure you want to delete %1$d?
delete_connection_warning: If you delete a contact, all history and upcoming transactions will be deleted.
x_have_been_added_to_cloud: %1$d has been added to the cloud.
error_page_desc: Our tech team has been informed. You'll be sent back to the previous page.
payday_description: %1$d in %2$d, %3$d for chores and %4$d in interest.
spend_your_money_description: if you want to buy something, a grown-up can make a withdrawal from the cloud.
no_connections_yet:
No contacts yet! 
Gimi is more fun with family in the app.
event_allowance_tips: Good to know about pocket money
event_withdrawal_tips: good to know about withdrawals from the cloud
event_how_to_save: How to save like a pro
event_how_to_spend: how to spend like a pro
event_add_cravings: What are your cravings? Add them!
event_keep_account: send a reminder for the invitation
error_could_not_complete_connection: the contact could not be added!
error_could_not_complete_connection_desc: a child can only add a grown-up and a grown-up can only add a child.
if_paying_full_descr: If you pay in full, you won't notice any difference from the earlier version of Gimi.
general_user_agreements: Gimi's Terms of Service & Privacy policy
new_kid_onboarding_welcome_desc_1: All the money you earn ends up in the cloud. The cloud shows how much money your connected grown-ups owe you!
new_kid_onboarding_welcome_desc_2: If you want to buy something, a grown-up makes a withdrawal from the cloud.
new_kid_onboarding_welcome_desc_3: Don't spend all your money! Save it and let it grow so you can buy the things you dream of!
new_parent_onboarding_welcome_desc_1: Young people learn to earn, save and manage money in a digital world.
new_parent_onboarding_welcome_desc_2: pocket money, chores and interest ends up in the Cloud. The money in the Cloud shows how much you owe your child.
new_parent_onboarding_welcome_desc_3: Children can save for a dream or spend the money with some help from you.
chore_suggested_sent: The suggestion is created and sent for approval
search_contacts: Search by name among your contacts
request_permission_title_camera: PLZ_CHECK Permission to access the camera is missing
request_permission_camera: PLZ_CHECK The app needs access to the camera to add picure proof and a new profile picture.
request_permission_title_notification: PLZ_CHECK The app doesn't have permission to send notifications
request_permission_notifications: PLZ_CHECK The app requests permission to send notifications to you when there are transactions or other events that affect your and your family's finances.
request_permission_title_microphone: PLZ_CHECK The app doesn't have permission to access the microphone
request_permission_microphone: PLZ_CHECK The app requests access to the microphone to allow you to take photos and send it as image proof for the chores performed
revoke_permission_microphone: PLZ_CHECK Are you sure you want to enable access to the microphone?
revoke_permission_title: PLZ_CHECK Removing permissions can lead to unexpected events
request_permission_photo: PLZ_CHECK The app requests access to the gallery so that you can add picures to dreams, chores and update your profile picture
request_permission_title_photo: PLZ_CHECK The app doesn't have persmission to access the gallery
revoke_permission_camera: PLZ_CHECK Are you sure you want to enable access to the camera?
revoke_permission_photo: PLZ_CHECK Are you sure you want to enable access to the gallery
revoke_permission_notifications: PLZ_CHECK Are you sure you want to remove the permission to send notifications

kid_allowance_month_error: Not available. %1$d already has weekly pocket money from somebody else.

word_from_ceo_desc: This is our biggest update that we have been working on for over a year. I hope you and your family will love it!
